summary: Create publish task for global item
description: Create publish task for global item. Only for China mainland sellers and Korean sellers.

query.name: shop_id
query.description: Id of shop to publish to.

query.name: item_name
query.description: Name of item. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your global product name into the local language.

query.name: description
query.description: Description of item. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your global product description into the local language.

query.name: original_price
query.description: Original price of item. For SG/MY/BR/MX/PL/ES/AR seller: Sellers can set the price with two decimal place, other regions can only set the price as an integer. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in local currency, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically calculate the price.

query.name: tier_variation
query.description: Tier variation information of item. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your variation information into the local language.

query.name: original_price
query.description: Original price of model. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in local currency, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically calculate the price.

query.name: model_status
query.description: can be "NORMAL" or "UNAVAILABLE". Normal models can be sold on the buyer's side, and UNAVAILABLE models cannot be sold on the buyer's side. If you do not upload this field, the model status will be considered as "NORMAL".

query.name: size_chart
query.description: Size chart of item. Only support image_id for now

query.name: enabled
query.description: If this logistic channel is enabled.

query.name: is_free
query.description: If this logistic channel is free.

query.name: days_to_ship
query.description: Days to ship, it's mandatory if is_pre_order is true.

query.name: description_info
query.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your global product description into the local language.

query.name: extended_description
query.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

query.name: field_type
query.description: Type of extended description field ï¼švalues: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

query.name: text
query.description: If field_type is text text information will be set by this field.

query.name: image_info
query.description: If field_type is imageimage url will be set by this field.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.

There is no sign in query.
partner does not have permission to operate shop
can not publish product to sip affiliated shop
shop is not upgraded or lack service fee rate
